1997’de kurulan Mavi Ofset, sektöründe k: Founded in 1997, Mavi Ofset has reached the present day by being a follower of innovations in its industry and committing itself to continuous improvement. 1997 yılında kurulan Mavi Ofset, matbaa: Established in 1997, Mavi Ofset continues its path as a leading company in the printing industry. Embracing the principle of closely following the latest innovations in the industry and constantly improving itself, Mavi Ofset has taken pride in providing its customers with high-quality, fast, and flexible services since 1997.
2000 metrekarelik geniş bir alanda faali: Operating in a spacious area of 2000 square meters, Mavi Ofset has specialized in every technical aspect of paper processing, printing, and binding with its experienced team of 50 people. Thus, the company has the ability to offer a wide range of services to its customers.
